html:
Canon USA has restocked both their camera and RF lens inventory, and there are some great deals to be had. The Canon RF 100-400mm f/5.6-8 IS USM is available for $519, which is a steal for such a great lens.

Canon RF Lenses & Extenders

  • Canon EOS R Refurbished Cameras
  • Canon RF 2x Teleconverter $479 (Reg $599)
  • Canon RF 15-35mm f/2.8L IS USM $1979 (Reg $2199)
  • Canon RF 16mm f/2.8 STM $239 (Reg $299)
  • Canon RF 24mm f/1.8 IS STM Macro $479 (Reg $549)
  • Canon RF 24-70mm f/2.8L IS USM $1979 (Reg $2199)
  • Canon RF 24-105mm f/4L IS USM $1169 (Reg $1299)
  • Canon RF 28mm f/2.8 STM $229 (Reg $249)
  • Canon RF 35mm f/1.4L VCM $1349 (Reg $1499)
  • Canon RF 35mm f/1.8 IS STM Macro $359 (Reg $449)
  • Canon RF 50mm f/1.8 STM $159 (Reg $199)
  • Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM $1979 (Reg $2199)
  • Canon RF-S 55-210mm f/5-7.1 IS STM $279 (Reg $349)
  • Canon RF 85mm f/2 IS STM Macro $489 (Reg $549)
  • Canon RF 85mm f/1.2L USM $2429 (Reg $2699)
  • Canon RF 85mm f/1.2L USM DS $2609 (Reg $2899)
  • Canon RF 100-400mm f/5.6-8 IS USM $519 (Reg $649)
  • Canon RF 1200mm f/8L IS USM $17999 (Reg $19999)

As always, all refurbished gear from Canon USA comes with a full 1-year Canon USA warranty.

Canon RF 1200mm f/8L IS USM Overview

Unparalleled length with a distinctly compact and lightweight design, the Canon RF 1200mm f/8 L IS USM is a super-telephoto prime offering a premium mixture of optics quality, intuitive handling, and professional-grade durability.

As one of the longest focal lengths available, this lens excels in wildlife and sports applications, offering uniquely close-up views of distant subjects. Combined with responsive AF, apt image stabilization, and a surprisingly lightweight design, the 1200mm f/8 is a specialized lens with a versatile feature-set.

L Series Optics

  • Featuring an optical design based on past EF and RF super-telephoto lenses, this lens features top-range optics designed for the most demanding shooting applications.
  • Two fluorite, one Super Ultra Low-Dispersion (UD), and one UD element virtually eliminate chromatic aberrations for outstanding clarity and color accuracy, void of chromatic aberrations or fringing.
  • Advanced optical design also contributes to the sleeker, more portable form factor of this RF-mount, mirrorless lens.
  • Both Air Sphere and Super Spectra Coatings improve image quality by maintaining high contrast and color accuracy while reducing lens flare and ghosting when working in strong lighting conditions.
  • Rounded nine-blade diaphragm contributes to a smooth bokeh quality.

USM Autofocus and Image Stabilization

Ultrasonic Motor delivers fast, accurate, and near silent autofocus performance to benefit both photo and video applications.

Impressively close 14.1′ minimum focusing distance, and a maximum magnification of 0.29x, suit working with nearby subjects, such as close-range wildlife, birds, and athletes.

Variable speed manual focusing offers three options for greater focusing control and full-time manual focus support permits making focus adjustments without switching modes.

Two focus presets can be stored for immediate recall to a specified focus distance.

Focus range limiter improves responsiveness by constraining the usable focusing range.

Benefitting handheld and monopod-based shooting, Optical Image Stabilization compensates for 4 stops of camera shake for sharper imagery. Due to the long focal length, in-body image stabilization, or Coordinated IS, from EOS R-series bodies is not supported with with this lens.

Intuitive Handling and Professional Reliability

  • Relatively lightweight and compact, this 1200mm f/8 lens weighs 7.4 lb and measures 21.1″-long, making it realistic to use atop a monopod or even handheld for short periods of time.
  • Built-in rotating tripod mount suits working with the lens atop a monopod or tripod and enables quick switching between vertical and horizontal shooting orientations.
  • Weather-sealed design for reliable use in inclement conditions.
  • Fluorine coating on the front element helps repel moisture, dust, and fingerprints and is also easier to clean.
  • Distinctive heat-resistant white paint finish.
  • Accepts drop-in style 52mm filters toward the rear of the lens.
  • Compatible with optional Extender RF 1.4x and 2x teleconverters for further extending the effective reach of this
